# DATASET: AMAZON REVIEWS
Link: https://www.kaggle.com/bittlingmayer/amazonreviews

# OBJECTIVES:
This project will aim on building models with two basic aims.
1. A binary text classifier
2. A review extractor.


## BINARY TEXT CLASSIFIER
Here we build binary text classifiers based on **Machine Learning** algorithms first and then move on to **Deep Learning** and **Transfer Learning approaches**.

## REVIEW EXTRACTOR
Here we build a review extractor that extracts reviews from the dataset belonging to the same group of product as mentioned in the input specification. The model was built based on semantic analogy of the reviews.
